knownErrors.BOT_HAS_NO_ENOUGH_PRIVILEGED_INTENTS: The bot does not have enough privileged intents to use this counter.
knownErrors.BOT_IS_NOT_PREMIUM: The bot is not a premium version and lacks certain features needed for this counter.
knownErrors.DELIMITED_DATA_SOURCE_IS_ILLEGAL_JSON: The counter is in a unrecognized format.
knownErrors.EVALUATION_RESULT_FOR_CHANNEL_NAME_IS_LE: The result for the channel name is less than 2 characters long.
knownErrors.EVALUATION_TIMEOUT: The evaluation took too long and timed out.
knownErrors.FAILED_TO_RETURN_A_FINAL_STRING: Failed to generate a final string from the evaluation.
knownErrors.GAME_MISSING_ADDRESS: The game counter requires a server address.
knownErrors.GAME_MISSING_GAME_ID: A game ID must be provided for the game counter.
knownErrors.GAME_MISSING_PORT: The game counter requires a server port.
knownErrors.HTTP_DATA_PATH_MANDATORY: A data path must be specified for HTTP requests whose content type is application/json.
knownErrors.HTTP_INVALID_RESPONSE_CONTENT_TYPE: The content type of the HTTP response is invalid (not text/plain or application/json).
knownErrors.HTTP_INVALID_RESPONSE_STATUS_CODE: The HTTP response status code is invalid (not 200).
knownErrors.HTTP_MISSING_URL: The HTTP counter requires a URL, which is missing.
knownErrors.MEMBER_COUNT_NOT_AVAILABLE: The member counts are not available at this moment.
knownErrors.MEMERATOR_MISSING_USERNAME: The Memerator counter requires a username, which is missing.
knownErrors.NO_ENOUGH_PERMISSIONS_TO_EDIT_CHANNEL: The bot does not have sufficient permissions to edit the channel.
knownErrors.REDDIT_MISSING_SUBREDDIT: A subreddit must be provided for the Reddit counter.
knownErrors.TWITCH_CHANNEL_NOT_FOUND: The specified Twitch channel could not be found.
knownErrors.TWITCH_MISSING_USERNAME: The Twitch counter requires a username to be set.
knownErrors.UNKNOWN_DATA_SOURCE: The counter provided is unknown or not recognized.
knownErrors.UNKNOWN_EVALUATION_RETURN_TYPE: The type of value returned from evaluation is unknown.
knownErrors.YOUTUBE_INVALID_CHANNEL_URL: The provided YouTube channel URL is invalid.
knownErrors.YOUTUBE_MISSING_CHANNEL_URL: The YouTube counter requires a channel URL to be set.

botStats.description: Return the total number of users and servers the bot is currently in. (You probably don't need this)
botStats.name: Bot stats

channels.description: Count the number of channels within specified categories or overall.
channels.name: Channels

clock.description: Display a clock adjusted to your preferred timezone.
clock.name: Clock

countdown.description: Create a countdown timer with a format tailored to your needs.
countdown.name: Countdown

game.description: Retrieve the current number of online players in your game server, compatible with more than 320 games.
game.name: Game

http.description: Send a GET request to an endpoint and provide the result to this bot.
http.name: HTTP

math.description: Perform math operations like addition, subtraction, multiplication, division, or modulus on a list of numbers.
math.name: Math

members.description: Count members, you can also filter them by their online status, specific roles and more.
members.name: Members

memerator.description: Fetch the follower count and meme count for a Memerator account.
memerator.name: Memerator

nitroboosters.description: Retrieve the count of Nitro boosters for the server.
nitroboosters.name: Nitro Boosters

number.description: Apply number formatting to the given number.
number.name: Number

reddit.description: Retrieve the title of a subreddit along with the total number of members and the count of members currently online.
reddit.name: Reddit

replace.description: Text replacement, useful in conjunction with other nested counters for comprehensive text modification.
replace.name: Replace

roles.description: Count all roles present in the server.
roles.name: Roles

twitch.description: Retrieve follower count and total view count for a Twitch channel.
twitch.name: Twitch

unknown.description: Unknown counter. This is probably due to an error
unknown.name: Unknown

youtube.description: Fetch subscriber count, video count, and total views from a YouTube channel.
youtube.name: YouTube

hooks.useConfirmOnLeave: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to leave this page?

deleteButton.confirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your account and remove your data from our servers.

userBadges.betaTester: You participated in a beta program.
userBadges.bigBrain: You suggested an idea that was implemented.
userBadges.bugCatcher: You found and reported a bug.
userBadges.contributor: You implemented a feature or fixed a bug.
userBadges.donor: You donated to support the development and maintenance of Member Counter.
userBadges.foldingAtHome: You contributed a WU in folding@home.

headings: Display your server’s member count dynamically
Show off your YouTube subscriber count
Monitor your Minecraft server's player count
Show off how many people is watching your Twitch channel
Display any data you want in your Discord server
Track how many players your FiveM server has
Show a clock adjusted to your preferred timezone
Create countdowns for events or special occasions
Monitor player stats across 320+ game servers
Fetch and display data from any API endpoint
Perform and display math operations on your data
Format numbers and display them beautifully

andMuchMore.description: Discover even more features and counters that can enhance your experience. Stay tuned for updates!
andMuchMore.title: And Much More!

clock.description: View the time in any timezone with our customizable clock. Perfect for coordinating across different regions.
clock.title: Clock

countdown.description: Create and manage countdown timers tailored to your specific events or deadlines.
countdown.title: Countdown

discordMembers.description: Count and filter members by online status, roles, and other criteria to get precise insights about your community.
discordMembers.title: Discord Members

game.description: Monitor your game server’s activity with real-time player counts for over 320 supported games.
game.title: Game

http.description: Execute GET requests and receive data directly from any endpoint, streamlining your integration needs.
http.title: HTTP

math.description: Perform a range of mathematical operations including addition, subtraction, multiplication, and more on multiple numbers.
math.title: Math

nitroBoosters.description: Track the number of Nitro boosters in your server to gauge community support and engagement.
nitroBoosters.title: Nitro Boosters

reddit.description: Get statistics on any subreddit, including title, member count, and online members.
reddit.title: Reddit

replace.description: Modify text dynamically with our powerful replacement tool, ideal in conjunction with the HTTP counter.
replace.title: Replace

twitch.description: Monitor Twitch channel metrics such as follower count and view statistics to stay updated on your favorite streamers.
twitch.title: Twitch

youtube.description: Retrieve key metrics from YouTube channels including subscriber count, video count, and overall views.
youtube.title: YouTube

noServers.heading: You aren't in any server.
noServers.subheading: Why you don't start by creating a <CreateServerLink>new one</CreateServerLink> or by <JoinSupportServerLink>joining us</JoinSupportServerLink>?

infoTooltip.enabled: Counters are enabled in this channel
infoTooltip.issue: There is an issue in this channel that requires your attention

ChannelNavItem.unsupportedChannelType: This channel type is not supported yet.

ServerNavMenu.unknownChannels: Visit saved channels if the Discord channels are unable to load

ChannelOptions.configWarning: Remember to return a valid category ID

ClockOptions.configWarning: Remember to return a valid timezone identifier

CountdownOptions.counterPreview: We can't show you a live preview when the target date or format is the result of a counter, you must preview the whole template to see how it will look like.
CountdownOptions.dateConfigWarning: Remember to return a valid UNIX timestamp
CountdownOptions.datePlaceholder: Or take date from a counter...
CountdownOptions.formatConfigWarning: Remember to return a valid formatting string
CountdownOptions.formatInstructions: Use %d to show the days left, %h for the hours left, and %m for the minutes left.
CountdownOptions.noPreview: We can't show you a live preview when the target date or format is empty.

GameOptions.addressWarning: Remember to return a valid address
GameOptions.gameWarning: Remember to return a valid node-gamedig game type
GameOptions.portWarning: Remember to return a valid port number

HttpOptions.dataPathDescription: A path to get the desired value when the response's content type is JSON, the syntax is similar to the one used by JS to access properties and array items.
HttpOptions.dataPathWarning: Remember to return a data path
HttpOptions.lifetimeDescription: Specifies for how long the response of the specified URL will be cached.
HttpOptions.lifetimeWarning: Remember to return a valid number
HttpOptions.noPreview: We can't show you a preview when the URL or data path is the result of a counter, you must preview the whole template to see how it will look like.
HttpOptions.urlWarning: Remember to return a valid URL

MathOptions.numberWarning: Remember to return a valid number

MemeratorOptions.usernameWarning: Remember to return a valid username

blockedBanner.text:
This server has been blocked for violating our Terms of Service or Acceptable Use Policy.
Reason given: {{reason}}
If you think this is a mistake, please contact our support team.

EnableTemplate.description: When enabled, Member Counter will automatically update this channel's {{templateTarget}} to show the processed template.

TemplateError.errorDescription: An error occurred during the last template processing. Details are shown below.
TemplateError.errorTitle: The template had an error when it was last processed

forbiddenPage.message:
You don't have permission to manage this server.
Ask an admin at {{guildName}} to give you Administrator or Manage Guild permissions.
forbiddenPage.title: Permission Denied

inviteBotBanner.message: It looks like the Member Counter Bot isn't in this server. Would you like to <LinkURL>add it</LinkURL>?

inviteBotPage.linkCopied: The link has been copied to your clipboard.
inviteBotPage.noPermission: You don't have enough permissions to add the bot. Please ask an administrator or someone with Manage Server permission to add this bot.
inviteBotPage.subtitle: Add Member Counter to {{serverName}} and enjoy real-time counters.
inviteBotPage.title: Let's set up the bot!
inviteBotPage.useOrShareLink: Use or share this link to add the bot.

block.blockDialogDescription: The given reason will be displayed to the server administrators.
block.blockDialogTitle: Do you really want to block this server?
block.unblockDialogDescription: This server was blocked due to the following reason: {{reason}}
block.unblockDialogTitle: Do you really want to unblock this server?

reset.dialogDescription: This action cannot be undone. All the settings will be reset to the defaults.

CustomDigits.customDigitsDescription: In counters that return a number, Member Counter will replace each digit with the ones you provide. This is useful if you want to display custom emojis or something else, such as "unicode style fonts."
CustomDigits.customizationRecommendation: We do not recommend customizing any digit unless you are certain that nobody using a screen reader will have access to any counter.
CustomDigits.screenReaderWarning: Keep in mind that users using a screen reader (text-to-speech) may not be able to understand the customized digits and <demoLink>may hear something unintelligible</demoLink>. Screen readers are often used by people with visual disabilities.

Locale.description: Changing this will affect how some counters are displayed.

UseCompactNotation.description: Counters that return numbers will be displayed in a more compact way.
UseCompactNotation.label: Use compact notation for numbers

advancedCounters.description: Get the most out of your counters, tailored to your needs.
advancedCounters.label: Like a pro
advancedCounters.title: Advanced counters

createFromScratch.description: Learn how to create your first custom counter in a few minutes.
createFromScratch.label: Be unique!
createFromScratch.title: Create from scratch

queryHistoricalStatistics.description: See how your counters and other common stats have evolved over time.
queryHistoricalStatistics.label: Coming Soon™
queryHistoricalStatistics.title: Query historical statistics

quickSetup.description: Quickly create the most common counters in a few clicks. No imagination or brain required!
quickSetup.label: Hassle-free!
quickSetup.title: Quick setup
